resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103426</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103426</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211573</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Physical Properties of Soil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physikalische Eigenschaften des Bodens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propriétés physiques de sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Propriedades físicas do solo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proprietà fisiche di terreno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σωματικές ιδιότητες του χώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características físicas del suelo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This animation provides an interactive ternary diagram that shows soil texture classifications for different silt, sand and clay content levels.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Animation liefert ein interaktives 
dreifaches Diagramm, das Bodenbeschaffenheit Klassifikationen für 
unterschiedliche zufriedene Stufen der Feinkohle, des Sandes und des 
Lehms zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette animation fournit un diagramme ternaire 
interactif qui montre des classifications de texture de sol pour 
différents niveaux contents de vase, de sable et d'argile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este animation fornece um diagrama ternário 
interativo que mostre classificações da textura do solo para níveis
satisfeitos diferentes do silt, da areia e da argila.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa animazione fornisce uno schema ternario 
interattivo che mostra le classificazioni di struttura del terreno per
i livelli soddisfatti differenti del limo, della sabbia e 
dell'argilla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ζωτικότητα παρέχει ένα διαλογικό τριαδικό 
διάγραμμα που εμφανίζει ταξινομήσεις εδαφολογικής σύστασης για τα
διαφορετικά ικανοποιημένα επίπεδα βούρκου, άμμου και αργίλου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta animación proporciona a un diagrama ternario
interactivo que muestre las clasificaciones de la textura del suelo 
para diversos niveles contentos del légamo, de la arena y de la 
arcilla.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211573</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103426</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/physical-properties-of-soil</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
